name: Leerie
description:
A submission for the 2022 7DRL involving a Leerie (old time lamp lighting profession) getting their city lit, and surviving.

Controls:

  • Keypad, Cursors, or WASD - Move the Leerie.  (Note, diagonal movement is disabled.)
  • L - Light or snuff your lantern.
  • Bump into light post - Light/snuff the light post.
  • Bump into enemy - Attack the enemy.
  • Keypad 5 or Space - Skip a turn and pick up whatever you're standing on.

Hope you have fun with it!
